message.body: Hi Mom! Is there a time that would be good for me to call you tomorrow to wish you a happy birthday? :)

Sry. Phone silent mode usully. Just read ur txt. Looks like tomw eve is free after 6:30. I'm just hoping birthdays aren't !!!BIRTHDAYS!!! here. Kinda incongruous maybe. Let me know ur free time slots & we'll tawk layta.
Btw, pls tell me u didn't spend ur whole summer working on Jason's ass-wipe research [my name for it].... )¥(
crashing now-> sleep. I'm telling u today that I love u. Not even asking if I already did....
Copy of Dad to Mom this am: Happy birthday, Lover. Let me know when we can talk, so I can give you the b-day wishes "in person".
Copy of Mom's reply: After 6:30& b4 u get too tired. Later on, pls give me some time slots, short or long, when u know what they are. I told Za after 6:30, too, but not specific yet. <x3

Is that a thong in an ass???!!! No that wasnt the research i was doing :P
Also happy birthday! :) I am totally free tonight.
Pls see my email to both of u about TAYing about our mutual WOOs.
Remember when life was simpler?? Hmmm. Or was it?
K. I'm here if U2 are
